instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01521: What is 820-01521? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 just back light no lcd display
threads.message: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 no water damage...i was check under microscope for damage but all look good...there is backlight ,the fan work, no Chime..but there is sound when i connect and disconnect the charger...so i think its work...just no picture..any idea where to start?

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 just back light no lcd display
threads.message:
USB activity?
[url]http://www.cmizapper.com/products/usb-tester.html[/url]
This is the best tester...

Did you check external video?

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 just back light no lcd display
threads.message: I have usb checker....i get 5v for 3 sec and then 20v stable, the external look good

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 just back light no lcd display
threads.message: If you have external video, then try known good full LCD assembly.

threads.title: macbook air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 just back light no lcd display
threads.message: Unfortunately I don't have one...but before i continue i must check with a good one...hope to find one soon
